value.title: Revisiting a Power BI solution with Dynamic M Parameters

value.title: Using Images from a Database in Power BI
value.excerpt: We've looked at images from sources like OneDrive and the web with your Power BI reports. What about from a database? Is that possible? Patrick takes a look at how you can do it. value.title: Visualize Graph Data in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you wondered how to visualize graph data? No, not Microsoft Graph. Graph Networks! Adam shows you how you can do this in Power BI Desktop. value.title: What is Power BI Gateway? Do You Need it to Connect to On-Premise Data? Can You Avoid Using One?

value.title: Generate Year Month Day Combinations in Power BI Report using Power Query Date ToText Function
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. value.title: Power BI Get Data from Google Sheets
value.excerpt: Power BI can get data from Google Sheet now. This functionality is released just yesterday and announced in both Power BI and Power Query blogs. value.title: Using ALLEXCEPT vs ALL VALUES
value.excerpt: ALLEXCEPT is a handy DAX function to retrieve all the columns of a table except for some. When used as a CALCULATE modifier, its behavior is less intuitive and might result in inaccurate measures. In this video, we elaborate on the most common mistake when using ALLEXCEPT in CALCULATE. Article and download:
